fields.name: Castilla y Leon Chardonnay VdT “Musso” 2019
fields.description: This "Musso" is a red wine that Casa Rojo produces within the Spanish denomination Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León. It is a pure tempranillo dominated on the nose by references to small red and black berry fruit, a prelude to a large and extensive sip, in which the excellent tannin workmanship is the key to a smooth and always satisfying drink.

fields.sku: Champagne Brut Blanc de Blancs Grand Cru Les Carelles,BlancdeBlancs,France,430.00,CHA-BLA-FRA-430
fields.name: Champagne Brut Blanc de Blancs Grand Cru "Les Carelles"
fields.description: The color is more load than the other wines. The perfume is very complex and, where they do not feel citrus notes but rather feelings of wildflowers and dried fruit. In the mouth it shows a very thick, almost fat, but never heavy because supported by a nice savory finish: the most balanced and fascinating among the wines of Selosse.

fields.sku: Friuli Isonzo Ribolla Gialla IGT 2019 - I Feudi di Romans,Italy,White,14.34,FRI-ITA-WHI-143
fields.name: Friuli Isonzo Ribolla Gialla IGT 2019 - I Feudi di Romans
fields.description: A typical white from Friuli, the Ribolla Gialla, is presented by the I Feudi di Romans winery with a very fresh and harmonious version, the result of the perfect relationship between grape variety and territory. The carefully selected grapes ferment in steel for 9 days at a temperature of 18 ° C, and then continue to refine on their own yeasts, again in steel, for about 3 months. A wine that you can't really say no to!

fields.name: Champagne Brut 2010 - Dom Pérignon
fields.description: Dom Perignon 2010 Vintage Champagne has aged for at least 8 years in their cellars and embodies the world-renowned perfect balance of Dom Perignon. Each vintage is a new creation that is singular and unique expressing the true character of the year.

fields.sku: Champagne Brut Blanc de Blancs Magnum - Ruinart,France,BlancdeBlancs,178.67,CHA-FRA-BLA-178
fields.name: Champagne Brut Blanc de Blancs Magnum - Ruinart
fields.description:
Encased in an iconic replica of a bottle from the 18th century, this magnum of the round and lively Ruinart Blanc de Blancs is large enough for elegant parties.
Blended from the harvest of various years to ensure consistent quality, this blanc de blancs champagne is a classic example of the style – smooth with a characteristic luminosity.

fields.sku: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico DOCG 2016 - Tommasi,Italy,Red,38.42,AMA-ITA-RED-384
fields.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico DOCG 2016 - Tommasi
fields.description: It is produced using exclusively indigenous grapes which, after the harvest in October, are dried on racks in the drying sheds until the following February. The Amarone della Valpolicella Classico DOCG of the Tommasi winery then matures for three years in Slavonian oak barrels. It interprets the classic style of the appellation wonderfully as a supple, mellow, full-bodied and complex wine.

fields.name: Mendoza Malbec “Potrero” 2018 - Vinos de Potrero
fields.description: The greatest expression of malbec from Gualtallari, which combines fruit purity and the florar and mineral notes from the terroir. A wine which though fresh and easy to drink, is honest and complex.

fields.name: Syrah “Boom Boom” 2018 - Charles Smith
fields.description:
These Washington State wines are full of flavour, balanced and approachable, and have consistently garnered 90+ scores by leading industry critics.
Smooth, firm and fresh, this wine has aromas and flavours of dark fruits, allspice and sweet tobacco.

fields.sku: Colli Orientali del Friuli Refosco DOC “Vigne Orsone” 2018 - Bastianich,Italy,Red,18.02,COL-ITA-RED-
fields.name: Colli Orientali del Friuli Refosco DOC “Vigne Orsone” 2018 - Bastianich
fields.description: One of the great classics of the appellation that the Bastianich family interpret with elegance and determination not far from Cividale del Friuli. A Refosco with a strong personality and unique profile, 80% fermented in large steel vats and 20% in small used oak barrels. From creating the final mix, with frequent stirring, a red wine rich in colour and acidity, fresh and at the same time fruity and of great harmony is created.

fields.sku: Franciacorta DOCG “Cuvée Prestige - Edizione 43 - Ca' del Bosco,Italy,Brut,35.08,FRA-ITA-BRU-350
fields.name: Franciacorta DOCG “Cuvée Prestige - Edizione 43" - Ca' del Bosco
fields.description: Franciacorta Ca del Bosco Prestige Cuvee Brut is one of Italy's greatest sparkling wines and is quite spectacular. Consisting of 75% Chardonnay, 10% Pinot Bianco and 15% Pinot Nero, all vinified separately.

fields.sku: Côtes du Roussillon Rosé “La Grande Cuvée” 2019 - Domaine Lafage,Rose',France,20.02,CTE-ROS-FRA-200
fields.name: Côtes du Roussillon Rosé “La Grande Cuvée” 2019 - Domaine Lafage
fields.description: La Grande Cuvée Rosé is a selection of old vine Grenache Gris and Grenache Noir (70%) and Mourvèdre (30%) planted on the red schist soils of Les Asprès. At harvest, it is selected and picked by hand and carefully sorted at the cellar to ensure that only the ripest and healthiest fruit is used. Its pale hue coming entirely from the color of the free-run juice, this rosé is fermented by indigenous yeasts and aged in tank with a small portion aged in new 500L French oak demi-muids

fields.sku: Champagne Blanc de Blancs - Bernard Remy,Blanc de Blancs,France,24.90,CHA-BLA-FRA-249
fields.name: Champagne Blanc de Blancs - Bernard Remy
fields.description: Lively, fresh and intense with a delicate and persistent mousse. Soft on the palate it is led by powerful citrussy flavours, lemon zest and a hint of honeydew melon. This 100% Chardonnay is refreshing and elegant with a lingering finish.

fields.sku: Trento DOC Maximum Blanc de Blancs - Ferrari,Blanc de Blancs,Italy,19.90,TRE-BLA-ITA-199
fields.name: Trento DOC “Maximum Blanc de Blancs" - Ferrari
fields.description: The winery Ferrari elaborates this Ferrari Trento Maximum Blanc de Blancs Brut (£18.18), a sparkling wine from Trento that contains chardonnay grapes and shows an alcoholic content of 12.5%. The Ferrari Trento Maximum Blanc de Blancs Brut is the ideal sparkling to combine with seafood and fish. 4 of 5 points is the average score of this sparkling according to Drinks&Co users.

fields.sku: Spumante Metodo Classico Zero Dosage Blanc de Noirs Farfalla - Ballabio, Blanc de Noirs,Italy,24.50,
fields.name: Spumante Metodo Classico Zero Dosage Blanc de Noirs "Farfalla" - Ballabio
fields.description: The "Farfalla" Blanc de Noir is a great class sparkling wine rifermented in bottle according to classic method. The bouquet is centered on fruity and citrus tones with accents of bread and pastry. The taste is fresh and refined, harmonic and elegant, enlivened by a creamy and persistent foam

fields.name: Maremma Toscana Rosato DOC “Litorale” 2019 - Val delle Rose, Cecchi
fields.description: Litorale Rosato is characterized by its natural freshness and varietal typicality (100% Sangiovese). Suitable as an aperitif or in combination with pasta, vegetarian dishes, or fish dishes with intense flavors.

fields.name: Rioja Crianza 2017 - Viña Real
fields.description:
Vina Real Crianza is a red wine from La Rioja produced by Viña Real, a member of the CVNE group. It is a blend of Tempranillo (90%), which clearly dominates, and Garnacha, Mazuelo and Graciano (10%).

Vina Real Crianza is produced from grapes from vineyards in the area of La Rioja Alavesa, they are harvested manually and undergo the production process in the Viña Real.

The grapes, once destemmed, are left in stainless steel tanks where the alcoholic fermentation takes place for 10 to 12 days at 26º.

After malolactic fermentation, Vina Real Crianza is transferred to barrels of American and French oak.

Vina Real Crianza is aged for a period of between 13 and 14 months. During this time, the wine is racked every half year.
